main event: On 7 September 1966, a 7-year old boy observed an unidentified flying object in Dalton, Kentucky.
interesting points: The object emitted a red glow and moved eastward,The boy described the noise as between a jet plane and a buzz saw,The observation lasted approximately 5-6 seconds,The witness was hysterical when reporting the sighting,The object was compared to a huge satellite by the observer.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with a red glow
witness description: A 7-year old boy who was playing alone on a rural road.
